98  void Load(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
99  eternity::xml_archive fa;
100  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::load);
101  xml_serialize(fa, "");
102  fa.close();
103  }
104 
105  void Save(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
106  eternity::xml_archive fa;
107  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::store);
108  xml_serialize(fa, "");
109  fa.close();
110  }
111 
112  void xml_serialize(eternity::xml_archive& xml, const char* p) {
113  char buffer[1024];
114 
115  if (xml.is_loading()) {
116 
117  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", p);
118  xml.read(buffer, mOrder, 0);
119  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorF", p);
120  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorF, xml, buffer);
121  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorB", p);
122  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorB, xml, buffer);
123  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrF", p);
124  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrF, xml, buffer);
125  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrB", p);
126  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrB, xml, buffer);
127  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mStatus", p);
128  xml.read(buffer, mStatus, 0);
129 
130  } else {
131 
132  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", p);
133  xml.write(buffer, mOrder);
134  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorF", p);
135  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorF, xml, buffer);
136  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorB", p);
137  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorB, xml, buffer);
138  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrF", p);
139  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrF, xml, buffer);
140  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrB", p);
141  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrB, xml, buffer);
142  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mStatus", p);
143  xml.write(buffer, mStatus);
144 
145 
146 
147  }
148  }

156 
163  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData, SeqViewDouble& WhitenedData) {
164  Dmatrix* in = InputData.GetData();
165  Dmatrix* out = WhitenedData.GetData();
166 
167  if ((in->size1() != out->size1()) || (in->size2() != out->size2())) {
168  out->resize(in->size1(), in->size2());
169  LogWarning("LatticeFilter: resizing output view");
170  }
171  WhitenedData.SetStart(InputData.GetStart());
172  WhitenedData.SetSampling(InputData.GetSampling());
173 
174  for (unsigned int r = 0; r < in->size1(); r++) {
175  execute(row(*in, r), row(*out, r));
176  }
177  }
178
